synopsis.text:
B-gata, a versatile battle android known as 2B, is dispatched to a desolate Earth in the year 5312. She joins the ranks of the YoRHa, an elite android unit deployed by the last remnants of humanity in a desperate attempt to reclaim their home from the clutches of an alien invasion. These extraterrestrial beings have unleashed an army of relentless Machine Lifeforms, driving mankind to the brink of annihilation and forcing the survivors to seek refuge on the moon.

As the war between the androids and the Machine Lifeforms reaches a seemingly endless stalemate, 2B and her analytical counterpart, 9S, find themselves navigating a series of enigmatic events that begin to unravel the hidden truths of this shattered world. Amidst the chaos of their mission, these lifeless androids grapple with the weight of their existence and the sacrifices they must make for the sake of a humanity they may never truly know.

Join 2B and 9S as they embark on a perilous journey to uncover the secrets of this post-apocalyptic wasteland and fight an endless battle to restore the future of mankind.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
